info.name: Dark Facebook Messenger.com (fully black)
info.description: Facebook Messenger (messenger.com) in black color. Of course these cute penguins are only to censor my contact's photos. If you find any bug please tell me. You can find my mail on my homepage.
info.additionalInfo:
16-02-2018 >
- fixed search results bar

11-02-2018 >
- fixed background colors in messages from bots (?)
- other small fixes

23-03-2017 >
- fixed border around message bouble (messenger had spoiled something)
- removed opacity on contact avatars (caused bug with square avatars in Chrome and Messenger For Desktop)

01-02-2017 >
- changed color of search bar
- changed color of urls in messages

23-02-2017 >
- incoming message is now dark grey
- default (blue) color of sent messages is now dark blue, other were untouched (thanks for auscompgeek)
- fixed search bar
- fixed games
- fixed messages with code

14-12-2016 >
- share button is now visible as normal, grey (without any trick like background before)
- sticker button is visible

04-12-2016 >
- another try for color in searching people in new message or sharing content
- made background for share button to make it visible
- made login screen (nobody cares, but anyway changed some colors...)
- made icon of new message "person" visible

29-11-2016 >
- added animation on chat when there is unread message

27-11-2016 >
- fixed color of group conversation title
- fixed color of last activity label (2m ago, Active on messenger etc.)
- fixed color of font while changing group conversation name

01-05-2016 >
- fixed color of "Add people" button

26-04-2016 >
- text in main chat (like "/me does something" or "Scored 123 in basketball")
- buttons to change emoji, color, nickname have now visible text
- color of missed call is always white (it was black before, now you can notice it easily)

16-02-2016 >
- "Mute Conversation" is now visible
- some improvements in the sticker store

05-02-2016 >
- fixed colors in searching for people to chat (on the left side)

04-01-2016 >
- fixed colors in group conversations (people in conversation and pop-up where you add more of them)

02-01-2016 >
- fixed too small name box on the top
- removed bar which recommended to download an app on your phone
- fixed color of timestamp in messages (the main chat section)
